recipes.name: Classic Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, eggs, milk, and sugar. Cook on buttered griddle until golden brown.

recipes.name: Scrambled Eggs
recipes.instructions: Beat eggs with salt. Melt butter in pan and cook eggs, stirring frequently.

recipes.name: Simple Omelette
recipes.instructions: Beat eggs, pour into buttered pan, add cheese, fold and serve.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Butter bread, add cheese between slices, grill until golden on both sides.

recipes.name: Tomato Soup
recipes.instructions: Saut√© onion and garlic in butter. Add tomatoes and salt. Simmer and blend.

recipes.name: Pasta with Butter
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta in salted water. Drain and toss with butter.

recipes.name: Cheese Toast
recipes.instructions: Top bread with cheese and toast until cheese melts.

recipes.name: Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: Fry rice with beaten eggs, add vegetables and soy sauce. Mix well.

recipes.name: Basic Smoothie
recipes.instructions: Blend banana, milk, and honey until smooth.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.instructions: Slice tomatoes and cheese. Layer with basil and drizzle with olive oil.
